benefits.description: If negotiations with an upbeat Shadow fails, you can try again.
Chance to perform a follow-up attack if Joker’s attack does not down the enemy.
Makes you less likely to be found in the Metaverse while dashing.
Chance to cure status ailments inflicted upon party members.
When encountering a weak Shadow, you may destroy it immediately.
Chance to shield Joker from an otherwise fatal attack.
Transforms his Persona into a mythological trickster.
Fuse with the mythological Trickster, awakening its true power.
When Joker is inflicted with an ailment, he may recover immediately.
Chance to receive the effects of Charge and Concentrate at the start of battle.
Chance to restore Joker’s SP when it is low.
Raises the chance of Flow succeeding.
Raises the chance of Detox X succeeding.
Increases the selection of healing items at the clinic.
Adds more healing items to the clinic.
Adds support items to the inventory at the clinic.
Decreases the price for all items sold at the clinic.
